DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFSCR202 Past 30 Days Have Any Type of Sexual Activity Indicator Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of whether they had any type of sexual activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days Have Any Type of Sexual Activity Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about whether an individual had any type of sexual activity._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
Concepts.definition: A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days Have Any Type of Sexual Activity Indicator
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about whether an individual had any type of sexual activity.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: Have Any Type of Sexual Activity
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual had any type of sexual activity.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did you have any type of sexu
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did you have any type of sexual activity?  (Examples of sexual activity are masturbation, oral sex, and sexual intercourse.)
